verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my cry, <S%H7440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Listen <S%H7181><s%> to my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>

From the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> to you, <S%H3820><s%> when my heart is overwhelmed. <S%H5848><s%> Lead <S%H5148><s%> me to the rock <S%H6697><s%> that is higher than I. <S%H7311><s%>
For you have been a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for me, <S%H5797><s%> a strong tower <S%H4026><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the enemy. <S%H341><s%>
I will dwell <S%H1481><s%> in your tent <S%H168><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> I will take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in the shelter <S%H5643><s%> of your wings. <S%H3671><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
For you, <S%H430><s%> God, have heard <S%H8085><s%> my vows. <S%H5088><s%> You have given <S%H5414><s%> me the heritage <S%H3425><s%> of those who fear <S%H3373><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
You will prolong <S%H3254><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s life; <S%H3117><s%> his years <S%H8141><s%> shall be for <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

He shall be enthroned <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s presence <S%H6440><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> Appoint your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth, <S%H571><s%> that they may preserve him. <S%H5341><s%>
So I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to your name <S%H8034><s%> forever, <S%H5703><s%> that I may fulfill <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> daily. <S%H3117><s%>
